docs.snippet: Democratic leaders are determined to make health care the centerpiece of their attacks against Republicans leading into next year’s midterm elections.

headline.print_headline: Health Care Is Front and Center in Democrats’ Official Response
headline.main: Health Care Is Front and Center in Democrats’ Response to Trump Address

docs.snippet: People have encountered jammed phone lines as they try to air views on Donald J.Trump’s nominees and other issues. But lawmakers’ staff members are wading through thousands of calls.

docs.snippet: As funerals were held for victims of a truck attack Sunday in Jerusalem, Israelis remained divided over a soldier’s conviction for killing a wounded and incapacitated Palestinian terrorist.

headline.print_headline: Israel Buries 4 Soldiers, but the Mourning Is Marred by Discord
headline.main: Israel Buries 4 Soldiers, but the Mourning Is Marred by Discord

docs.snippet: If you believe the quality of customer care has declined, you’re not alone in feeling frustrated or angry. Here’re tips to get what you want.

docs.snippet: Uber’s reputation is in tatters. Fixing its culture is the only way out.

docs.snippet: The stunning gaffe instantly became the central theme of the awards ceremony. And just as quickly, PwC had a major brand crisis on its hands.

docs.snippet: One of the most hyped technologies of 2016 has a way to go before it becomes mainstream, with product sales held back by high costs, ergonomic issues and other factors.

docs.snippet: Facundo de Zuviría’s formal images of Buenos Aires storefronts shuttered during Argentina’s 2001 economic crisis reveal the city’s character in its rapidly-changing neighborhoods.

headline.main: Finding a Muse in the Vanishing Neighborhoods of Buenos Aires

docs.abstract: Facundo de Zuviría’s formal images of Buenos Aires storefronts shuttered during Argentina’s 2001 economic crisis reveal the city’s character in its rapidly-changing neighborhoods.
